评论详情: The size I bought was comfortable and had a nice fit but they didn’t last a month before the clothing balls formed between the thighs and they the zip broke and the actual pants ripped right under the zipper…so over all everything was perfect until things went left

These pants looked good and felt good and fit perfectly. I walked a whole parade in these pants. I wasn’t uncomfortable or over heated. They didn’t make me sweat as I walked. It was a good buy. I like them.
